name: Ghoulie Forest
description:
Description

While managing a socially distant trick or treat candy bowl this Halloween, I created a standalone rip off of the classic Doom2 mod "Ghoul's Forest"

How to Play

The name of the Ghoulie will be on the sacred rock.

Survive 5 encounters...

Controls

  • WSAD - Movement 
  • Space - Jump
  • Left Mouse - Shoot
  • Right Mouse - Aim down sights
  • R - Reload
  • F - Flashlight
  • Esc - Return to Main Menu

Features

4 Different Ghoulies - each with a unique behavior. Replay to experience them all! Check the name on the rock to ensure you have encountered each

 Requirements

  • PC only at the moment
  • Should work on a crappy laptop
  • Turn up your headphones, sound is important!
